Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, reflecting years of dedication and hard work. I believe it has the potential to be equally valuable to you. For this unique offering, I am proposing a price of $20000. This amount reflects not only the cost of production but also the intrinsic value I place on this product. I am confident that you will find its features and benefits to be well worth the investment. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
